name: Human Trafficking
description: Reported incidences of human trafficking inflows. Score 0 (no flows) and 5 (very high flows)

name: Legal Prostitution
description: Dummy indicating whether or not a country allows prostitution. 1 being legal and 0 otherwise

name: Legal Brothels
description: Dummy indicating whether or not a country allows brothel/pimping. 1 being legal and 0 otherwise

name: Rule of Law
description: Index in the range of −2.5 to 2.5, with higher values corresponding to better outcomes

name: Log Population
description: Log of a country’s total population

name: Log GDP Per Capita
description: Log of GDP per capita, PPP (constant 2005 international $)

name: Democracy
description: Indicates whether multiple parties are legally allowed and exist outside the regime front, and whether the selection of the executive and the legislature involve an either direct or indirect mandate from an electorate

name: Share of Catholics
description: Share of Catholics in overall population
